bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Flyout mode not expanding in full screen mode
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Flyout mode for runs is not taking expanding on full screen. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/86377344-84ee3800-bc88-11ea-9282-711a4480fc14.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Start some runs, and go to the runs (jobs, services, dags, parallel), and enable full screen mode. View a run in flyout mode. Notice the issue.
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/86377608-d26aa500-bc88-11ea-9c49-580e7163fccd.png></denchmark-link>
The flyout mode should expand to the full length of the screen, the solution is quite easy, but I am not sure why that css snippet was made in the first place. I think the best solution is to keep the css in-place and disable it for full screen mode. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
UI v1.1.0. But the issue is also noticeable in v1.0.86, so I think it was introduced somewhere between > v1.0.8 and < v1.0.86.
